pages.title: Kamen Rider Eld
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gotchard (2023, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gotchard/devices/eldoradriver#eldoradriver_eld)Eldoradriver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch VI$(li)Strength IX (with empty hand)$(li)Strength VI (with weapon)$(li)Speed VI$(li)Resistance VI$(li)Water Breathing$(li)Night Vision$(li)Regeneration$(li)Haste V$(li)Saturation$(li)Jump Boost VI$(li)Fire Resistance
